summary: Mod for people making a new game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is to help people who make a new game and then suddenly can't figure out what they want to do. There are 3 books inside Helgen Keep, each of them have their own class information.

Volume 1 shows Warrior Type Classes, Volume 2 shows Mage Type Classes and Volume 3 shows Thief Type Classes.

There shouldn't be any incompatability issues, as all it does is add 3 books to where you start. Unless you happen to have a mod that changes a place you hardly ever visit - Helgen Keep.

P.S: I suck at making books, so you have to turn the page to see the next part.
author: Lumi135
